meta.job_title: Head of Retail and Affiliate Banking

duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the estate planning activities to meet the needs and requirements from high net worth clients.
Monitor the operation of estate planning business to ensure achievement of banking objectives.
Lead the retail and affiliate banking division, overseeing financial services and product offerings.
Develop and implement strategies to attract and retain high net worth clients for wealth management and investment services.
Ensure compliance with banking regulations and standards in all retail and affiliate banking operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Banking, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
